name: hiito-hello-typescript-world
description: Hello World with EdgeWorkers using TypeScript

scripts.start: run-s start:1 start:2 start:3 start:4 start:5 start:6
scripts.start:2: read -p "### (2/6) Your EdgeWorker code name? : " name && npe name $name
scripts.start:4: read -p "### (4/6) Set initial script version (default:0.0.1) : " ver; [[ $ver = "" ]] && export ver="0.0.1"; npe version $ver
scripts.start:5: read -p "### (5/6) Property name associated with this ew code  : " property && npe property $property
scripts.start:6: read -p "### (6/6) Host name associated with this ew code  : " property && npe host $host
scripts.get-ewid: export ewid=`akamai edgeworkers li --section $npm_package_edgercsection | grep $npm_package_name | cut -d " " -f 1` && npe ewid $ewid
scripts.new-sandbox-p: akamai sandbox create --property $npm_package_property --name $npm_package_property --section $npm_package_edgercsection && akamai sandbox add-edgeworker $npm_package_ewid ./dist/bundle.tgz --section $npm_package_edgercsection
scripts.new-sandbox: akamai sandbox create --hostname $npm_package_property --name $npm_package_property --section $npm_package_edgercsection && akamai sandbox add-edgeworker $npm_package_ewid ./dist/bundle.tgz --section $npm_package_edgercsection
scripts.token: export token=`akamai edgeworkers create-auth-token --format curl --expiry 60 $npm_package_host  --section $npm_package_edgercsection| cut -d " " -f 3` && npe token $token
scripts.sandbox-test: wrap () { export url="$*"; http 127.0.0.1:9550/$npm_package_path host:$npm_package_host Pragma:"akamai-x-get-cache-key, akamai-x-cache-on, akamai-x-cache-remote-on, akamai-x-get-true-cache-key, akamai-x-check-cacheable, akamai-x-get-request-id, akamai-x-serial-no, akamai-x-get-ssl-client-session-id, X-Akamai-CacheTrack, akamai-x-get-client-ip, akamai-x-feo-trace, akamai-x-tapioca-trace, akamai-x-ew-debug" Akamai-EW-Trace:$npm_package_token; }; wrap
scripts.test: wrap () { export url="$*"; http $url host:$npm_package_host Pragma:"akamai-x-get-cache-key, akamai-x-cache-on, akamai-x-cache-remote-on, akamai-x-get-true-cache-key, akamai-x-check-cacheable, akamai-x-get-request-id, akamai-x-serial-no, akamai-x-get-ssl-client-session-id, X-Akamai-CacheTrack, akamai-x-get-client-ip, akamai-x-feo-trace, akamai-x-tapioca-trace, akamai-x-ew-debug" Akamai-EW-Trace:$npm_package_token; }; wrap
